data.name: Super Retro Fighter Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Super Retro Fighter OST includes 13 original soundtracks produced by Liang-Audio, including five for battle, three for BOSS fight, and some other soundtracks used for specific scenes.

All tracks are available in MP3 and lossless WAV files.

New tracks will be added to the OST as the game is updated, and the price will be increased accordingly.If you have already purchased the OST, the price will not change.

Minimum:
  • Storage: 47 MB available space
